apresentation.apresentation-text-p: A boy who transforms lines of code into innovative solutions.

end-to-end-applications.end-to-end-applications-text:
Applications created and developed from
End to End

about-me.about-me-text: Hello, my name is Guilherme Fortunato Machado, I am currently 16 years old and I live in Paraná, since I was 9 years old I have had contact with programming and game development, at 12 years old I created my first website, I made the Fullstack course from Danki Code and today I have certificates as Game Developer, Web Developer and Application Programmer, I have knowledge in languages such as PHP, JavaScript and Lua as a programming language for games. I'm interested in work or freelance work in the Fullstack or Mobile area, and I'm also learning Python and in the future Ruby. I have knowledge in technologies such as React JS, React Native and a little NodeJS, Front-End Frameworks such as Bootstrap, Materialize and SASS, and in databases what I have I have more knowledge of MySQL, I also have some knowledge of MongoDB.

knowledge.knowledge-modal-button: More About My Knowledge

contact.contact-call-to-action-text:
Let's Talk?
Send me an email and
Enter In Contact Me.

knowledge-modal-courses.knowledge-modal-courses-dankicode-descri: Danki Code's FullStack Master package, which contains more than 25 courses preparing you to be a true web developer, a large part of my web knowledge came from there.
knowledge-modal-courses.knowledge-modal-courses-alura1-descripti: A course offered by the government of Paraná through New Secondary Education, I learned a little about data request, waterfall model, etc.
knowledge-modal-courses.knowledge-modal-courses-alura2-descripti: Through the Edutech program that took place in 2021, I participated and had access to Alura courses that taught how to develop basic games using Scratch, JavaScript & GameMaker Studio.
knowledge-modal-courses.knowledge-modal-courses-high_school-titl: Systems Analysis and Development - New High School 2nd Year - Paraná
knowledge-modal-courses.knowledge-modal-courses-high_school-desc: I am currently in the 2nd year of New High School studying Systems Analysis and Development which lasts a total of 3 years.

knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-programming: Programming logic is the basis of everything in the world of programming.
knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-front_end-d: Teaching everything from the basics and fundamentals of Front-End to more advanced concepts.
knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-front_end2-: The course taught Front-End in a more modern way, using the latest HTML 5 tags such as header, section, footer, etc and also using flexbox leaving float in the past.
knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-web_design-: Taught about User Experience (UX) and the best ways to create a beautiful, eye-catching and healthy design for your business.
knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-javascript-: A famous and powerful programming language mainly used in Web Development.
knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-app_develop: Learned how to develop applications using the most famous JavaScript Library to develop applications for Android and IOS which would be React Native.
knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-firebase-de: The course taught you how to host your applications using Google's powerful cloud-based platform.
knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-php-descrip: Taught about PHP, its fundamentals and in-depth knowledge of the language.
knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-database-de: A course that teaches the main relational and non-relational databases used, which would be MySQL and MongoDB respectively.
knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-english_for: Learned a little English more aimed at programmers and their technical concepts.
knowledge-modal-certificates.knowledge-modal-certificates-alura_all_c: All the courses taken and their respective workloads throughout my journey studying at Alura.
